title.rendered: Al Bateen International Airport (AZI) UAE Contact Details

content.rendered:
Al Bateen International Airport (AZI), UAE Contact Address, Phone number, Email, Location Map, Website

Al  Bateen Airport Call Centre

Telephone:  00971 (0) 24942400 / 00971 (0) 24949999

Fax: 00971 (0) 02 494 2333

Handling services & facilities: 24/7

Email: fbo@munawala.

IATA Code: AZI

ICAO Code: OMAD

Website: http://www.albateenairport.ae/english/

View Location of Al Bateen International Airport: https://www.google.co.in/maps?biw=1366&bih=613&bav=on.2,or.&q=al+bateen+international+airport&um=1&ie=UTF-8&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjfucmWjb3SAhVEoJQKHaRbCU8Q_AUIBigB

Al Bateen Executive Airport, the region’s only airport dedicated to business aviation, is situated in the heart of the city just 10 minutes from the Corniche.

Facilities and Services available at AL Bateen Airport (AZI)

  • Relaxation Lounge
  • Sleep rooms
  • Showers
  • Rest areas
  • Meeting & conference facility
  • Baggagge screening
  • Ramp access
  • Spacious and luxurious executive terminal
  • Car parking
  • Onsite gournet catering
  • Acquisition of landing permits
  • Secure apron & hangar parking
  • Complete ground handling services
  • Concierge services (transport & hotel arrangements)
  • Fuelling services
  • Aircraft cleaning services
